TMR_SR_PortPowerAndSettlingTime Struct Reference

#include <serial_reader_imp.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

uint8_t port

Detailed Description

Per-port power levels and settling times. Used by TMR_SR_cmd{Get,Set}AntennaPortPowersAndSettlingTime.

Member Data Documentation

uint8_t TMR_SR_PortPowerAndSettlingTime::port

The port number.

uint16_t TMR_SR_PortPowerAndSettlingTime::readPower

The power level to use for read operations, in centidBm.

uint16_t TMR_SR_PortPowerAndSettlingTime::settlingTime

The duration to wait after switching to this port, in microseconds.

uint16_t TMR_SR_PortPowerAndSettlingTime::writePower

The power level to use for write operations, in centidBm.
